programme.title: A Vineyard Christmas
programme.desc: Heather is determined to create the perfect Christmas episode by featuring a unique winery from her hometown.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Pairing
programme.desc: After a bad review from a food critic, renowned chef Grace Cooke returns home for Christmas and reconnects with her roots.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Carol
programme.desc: When a fiercely independent pastry chef agrees to accompany her hunky dream man home for the holidays, things quickly devolve as he reverts into a momma's boy and she finds herself caught in a tug-of-war with his smothering mother.

programme.title: Christmas With Felicity
programme.desc: A struggling baker returns to her hometown to try to get Christmas spirit back.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica must learn to step outside her shell and challenge her inhibitions.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica returns to her brother Leo's death.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica quits therapy and Dr. Naadiah sends her back to a bar where she meets a troubled Dr. Tom.

programme.title: A Match for the Prince
programme.desc: A medieval romance novelist is hired to be a matchmaker for a real-life prince in a desperate attempt to find true love before the fixed royal wedding date.

programme.title: A Royal Recipe for Love
programme.desc: When Emma, a baker in NYC, is hired to bake for the king and queen of Sanovia's anniversary party, she is convinced a good job will lead to her landing a cookbook deal.

programme.title: How to Win a Prince
programme.desc: A perennially single dating coach attempts to seduce a prince as she helps him navigate the cut-throat NYC dating scene.

programme.title: The Royal Bake Off
programme.desc: The rivalry between bakers Allie and Marily intensifies when the prince of Samavia arrives looking for a royal baker. When Allie and the prince hit it off, it seems he might be in the market for more than just a terrific cake.

programme.title: Christmas Lovers Anonymous
programme.desc: A best-selling author hides her love for Christmas after an ugly break up, but finds love again when she joins a website for people who are crazy about Christmas.

programme.title: The Heiress of Christmas
programme.desc: Heiress to the famed department store Hamptons, Loryn is put to the test by her grandmother. Things don't run smoothly as Loryn works at the store during its busiest time of the year and tries to impress the handsome but cynical manager Aiden.

programme.title: A Christmas Wish in Hudson
programme.desc: A woman takes a shot at love after seeing a widowed firefighter and chef on a cooking show. With the help of his daughter, the two of them might find love this Christmas.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When a woman returns home to find her ex in a relationship, she enlists her best friend to act as her fake boyfriend.

programme.title: Coupled Up for Christmas
programme.desc: Tiffany finally reunites with her longtime crush, Brett, only to find out he has a serious girlfriend. She decides to pair up with a recently heartbroken Peter to win back the affection of their respective soulmates.
